Producer: Jessalyn Abbott, James Belfer, Larry Fessenden, Robert Mockler, Jenn Wexler
Production Co: Lankn Partners, Dogfish Pictures, Go Infect Films, Glass Eye Pix, Like Me
Synopsis: A reckless loner, desperate for human connection, sets out on a crime spree that she broadcasts on social media. Her reality quickly splinters into a surreal nightmare as her exploits spiral out of control.
Title: Like Me
